name: SuperBolt
description:
Super Bolt

GameOff Submission

Cliches used: Screw Loose, Save the Princess, Exploding RED Barrels

The little robot Bolt is on an adventure to save the princess Wrench from an evil bot! Win against challanging enemies and levels! Use the PowerUps to blast your way through walls and bots alike and Unleash the Power of the 4 bumpers to defeat the evil 404! Controlls:

Move:

Arrows left & right  

A & D

Controller Joystick Left & Right (config for PS4 Controller)

Jump:

Space

Controller X (south button) PS4

Controller B (Xbox)

Shoot:

Left MouseButton

Keyboard J 

Controller [Square]  (West Button) PS4

Controller A (XBox)

Swim:

Arrows, WASD, Controller Joystick

Space to swim faster.

Assets used:

Alb_Pixel:

https://alb-pixel-store.itch.io/little-robo-adventure-world-2-asset
https://alb-pixel-store.itch.io/little-robo-advanture-world-1

DavidKBD:

https://davidkbd.itch.io/my-little-bots-crazy-music-for-robots-asset-pack
